Hi, Jason.
i was just about to post a related question and saw yours. What kind of procurement are you talking about? i know a number of local gov agencies (utilities, school districts and cities: Baltimore, St. Louis, Seattle, Portland, Thousand Oaks...) that use eBid eXchange for procurement that provides vendor, bid and contract management.
